thread.title: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'

title: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'
text: > Entertainment Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live' FILE - In this Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas. A Hispanic coalition is condemning NBC's "Saturday Night Live" for inviting Trump to host the show. In a letter sent Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, to the show's producer, Lorne Michaels, and the CEO of NBC Universal, Stephen Burke, the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda said the network was enabling Trump's "hateful speech" in exchange for ratings. (AP Photo/John Locher, File)
